content:
Congratulations on the success of your "Summer Sunset" signature cocktail! I'd be happy to help you with wine pairing suggestions for your wine and cheese night.

Before we dive into the pairings, can you please tell me a bit more about the type of cheese and wine selection you're planning to feature? Are you looking to focus on a specific region, such as France or Italy, or do you want to offer a variety of options?

Also, what's the general style of your wine and cheese night? Is it a casual gathering or a more formal affair? Knowing this will help me provide more tailored suggestions.

Lastly, I'm curious - what's in your "Summer Sunset" cocktail? I'd love to hear more about it!
